title: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming, including syntax, data structures, and basic algorithms, through engaging lessons and hands-on exercises.

title: Introduction to Web Development with HTML and CSS
description: This course will introduce you to the fundamentals of web development. You'll learn how to structure web pages with HTML and style them with CSS to create beautiful, responsive websites.
